name: gdal-async
description: Bindings to GDAL (Geospatial Data Abstraction Library) with full async support

scripts.lint:cpp: clang-format -i src/*.cpp src/*.hpp && clang-format -i src/*/*.cpp src/*/*.hpp
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:cpp
scripts.install: node-pre-gyp install --fallback-to-build -j max && echo 'I am currently unemployed and looking for work. Please, consider hiring me if you like and use gdal-async. Check https://github.com/mmomtchev to what I do and what is my current situation.'
scripts.doc:build: npx documentation build --config=documentation.yml src/*.cpp src/collections/*.cpp src/geometry/*.cpp lib/*.js -f=html -o=doc --theme=node_modules/documentation-hipster/index.js
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npx yatag && npm run test
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && node ./scripts/publish-packages.js && npm run doc:publish
scripts.test:u18: npm run container dev ubuntu:18.04 12 shared
scripts.test:u20: npm run container dev ubuntu:20.04 14 shared
scripts.test:u20n16: npm run container dev ubuntu:20.04 16 shared
scripts.test:u20n17: npm run container dev ubuntu:20.04 17 shared
scripts.test:u20n18: npm run container dev ubuntu:20.04 18 shared
scripts.test:c8: npm run container dev centos:stream8 14 shared
scripts.test:arch: npm run container dev archlinux:latest 16 shared
scripts.test:f33: npm run container dev fedora:33 14 shared
scripts.test:shared: npm run test:u18 && npm run test:u20 && npm run test:c8
scripts.prune: npx rimraf 'deps/@(libgdal|libproj)/*/!(data)' && npx rimraf 'deps/libcurl/!(cacert.pem)' && npx rimraf 'deps/!(libgdal|libproj|libcurl)'
